title: Ruth Ellis: the last woman to be hanged in Britain
itunes:title: Ruth Ellis: the last woman to be hanged in Britain
itunes:subtitle: Ahead of her new BBC Four series The Ruth Ellis Files, Gillian Pachter explores the controversial case of a British woman who was hanged for murder in 1955
description:
